```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
colorado <- readNWISdv(siteNumbers = c("09380000", # Colorado River at Lee's Ferry, AZ
                                       "06796000"),# Platte River near Louisville, NE
                       parameterCd = "00060",
                       startDate = "1959-10-01",
                       endDate = "2022-09-30") %>%
  select(site_no,
         date = Date,
         streamflow_cfs = X_00060_00003) %>%
  mutate(river = case_when(site_no == "09380000" ~ "Colorado River",
                           site_no == "06796000" ~ "Platte River"))

ggplot(data = colorado, aes(x = date,
                            y = streamflow_cfs)) +
         geom_line(aes(color = river)) +
  facet_wrap(~river, scales = "free_y")

```
